scenario_text.value: Hey, Lopmon. What are you doing?

Oh, I’m gathering food. I’m going to get as
much as I can, then give it all to Shuuji.
That’s nice. I hope he appreciates it.
Yeah... Eheheh. I hope so too...

I bet there’s more over there! Let’s check it
out!

Wait, no! If we get too far away, it might
put Shuuji in danger...

You really are looking out for Shuuji, aren’t
you?

Yeah. Fighting scares me, but... Shuuji is...
important to me.

(Given how Shuuji treats him, that’s really
admirable. If only he could see that.)
Oh, I’d better get back to helping Shuuji...
